{{Infobox School |name = Rosemere High School |image = |motto = |established = [[1966]] |type = [[State school|Public]] and [[High School|High school]] |grades = Secondary 1-5 |principal = Scott Traylen |students = 1400 |athletics = Football, Soccer, Hockey and Basketball |location = [[RosemÃ¨re, Quebec]], [[Canada]] |country = |homepage = [http://www.swlauriersb.qc.ca/schools/rhs/ Rosemere High School] }} '''Rosemere High School''' of the [[Sir Wilfrid Laurier School Board]][http://www.swlauriersb.qc.ca Sir Wilfrid Laurier School Board] is a high school located in the town of [[RosemÃ¨re, Quebec|Rosemere]], [[Quebec]], [[Canada]]. In the east: [[Repentigny, Quebec|Repentigny]], [[Le Gardeur, Quebec|Le Gardeur]] ==School sports== There are currently 11 Sport Programs at RHS: * Basketball ** Benjamine; Girls - Raiders ** Junior; Boys ** Senior; Boys - Raiders ** Senior; Girls - Tropix * Football: Rosemere Raiders ** Junior; Boys ** Senior; Boys *Hockey ** Junior; Boys ** Senior; Boys - Mustangs * Soccer ** Junior; Boys ** Junior; Girls - Strikers ** Senior; Boys ** Senior; Girls * Jungball ** Junior; Boys * Superthrow ** Junior; Boys * Curling League ** Senior Citizens ==References== ==External links== * [http://www.swlauriersb.qc.ca Sir Wilfrid Laurier School Board] * [http://www.swlauriersb.qc.ca/schools/rhs Rosemere High School official page] {{Coord missing|Quebec}} [[Category:High schools in Quebec]] [[Category:Anglophone schools in Quebec]]
